entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
